title: SHRIMADHAV ASTROLOGY – Premium Vedic Astrology Website

requirements.text: Apply a global visual theme across the entire site: light ivory/warm cream background (#FAF6EF or similar), gold accent color #D4AF37, saffron highlight color #FF9933, elegant serif font (e.g., Playfair Display or similar) for all headings, clean modern sans-serif font (e.g., Inter or Lato) for body text. Add subtle celestial/mandala SVG decorative patterns in the background. Ensure the layout is fully mobile responsive.
acceptanceCriteria: Background is ivory/warm cream throughout all sections
Gold (#D4AF37) is used for borders, dividers, and decorative accents
Saffron (#FF9933) is used for highlighted CTAs and price highlights
Headings render in a serif font; body text in a sans-serif font
Subtle mandala or celestial SVG pattern visible in hero/background areas
Layout adapts correctly on mobile (375px), tablet (768px), and desktop (1280px)
